meanings.definition: A person who participates in jehad.
meanings.sent1: The jehadists trained hard for their mission.
meanings.sent2: The jehadists traveled to the conflict zone.
meanings.sent3: The jehadists planned a picnic in the name of their cause.
meanings.sent4: The jehadists were like determined warriors on a sacred quest.
meanings.sent5: The image of the jehadists marching together was powerful.

meanings.definition: Members of a militant Islamic group.
meanings.sent1: Local authorities were on high alert for any jehadists entering the country.
meanings.sent2: The jehadists carried out a series of attacks in the region.
meanings.sent3: The jehadists accidentally ordered too much pizza for their meeting.
meanings.sent4: The jehadists' influence spread like wildfire in the community.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the jehadists was ominous and unsettling.
